author: Staff Reporter
text:
Ayanavaram police arrested six persons in connection with the murder of N. Arivazhagan of Puthiya Bharatham party on Saturday night.

Arivazhagan (45) of Slum Clearance Board tenements in Pachai Kallu on Veerasamy Street, Ayanavaram, was killed by a six-member gang near his house.

He was stabbed to death by the gang with knives.

A police team arrested the six men, including Logu, a history-sheeter, who had a long- standing enmity with Arivazhagan.

The suspects were remanded in judicial custody and lodged at Puzhal prison.
title: Six arrested in connection with murder
